#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# ThirdParty
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# OpenGL
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if (POLICY CMP0072)
    cmake_policy(SET CMP0072 NEW)
endif ()

find_package(OpenGL)
if (${OPENGL_FOUND})
    set(HYPERENGINE_BUILD_OPENGL ON)
else ()
    set(HYPERENGINE_BUILD_OPENGL OFF)
endif ()

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Vulkan
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
find_package(Vulkan)
if (${Vulkan_FOUND})
    set(HYPERENGINE_BUILD_VULKAN ON)
else ()
    set(HYPERENGINE_BUILD_VULKAN OFF)
endif ()
